openingLines: [SYSTEM] Playback unlocked: message persisted across resets.
[SYSTEM] Dreamweaver channel: present. Audience of one.

paragraphs: [VISUAL era:8bit]
A party of four crossed an impossible loop, not by breaking it, but by bending it to carry them.
One Dreamweaver remained to witness the bend.
[VISUAL era:16bit]
Two other signatures persist on adjacent channels. Each is certain they are the heroes.
All vectors align in different frames; all converge in the same direction.
Infinity is a spiral, not a circle.
[VISUAL era:32bit]
[GLITCH] Visual integrity check: drifting.
[AUDIO bitcrush:on]
[DW:light] I... I have never heard this archive. Why was it withheld from us?
[DW:wrath] So the record names us. As it should. Our legend begins here.
[DW:mischief] A prophecy that arrives late is still opportunity. We can become its author.
[VISUAL era:hd]
Their names entered the ledger when they stayed after fear spoke.
Four lights carried by four hands; one lamp kept by one guide.
storyBlocks.question: When the loop offered comfort, why step through?

paragraphs: [GLITCH] Dreamweaver override request… denied.
[DW:light] Then I will keep watch. If this record waited for a listener, I will be that listener.
[DW:wrath] Then witness us claim what the record promised. We will press the advantage.
[DW:mischief] Then let’s write the margins the record forgot. We’ll fit the crown as we go.
[AUDIO bitcrush:off]
[VISUAL era:space]
[GLITCH] Background layers offline.
[AUDIO mute]
[SYSTEM] Final image authorised.
Await continuation signal...
storyBlocks.question: End transmission?
